metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3044 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An excessively large PDF page size (found in fuzz testing, unlikely innormal PDF files) can result in a divide-by-zero in Xpdf's text extractioncode. This is related to CVE-2022-30524, but the problem here is caused bya very large page size, rather than by a very large character coordinate.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
